message: @kyserboy Just click on the show it will open in iTunes. Then click subscribe
You should see a subscribe button under the cover art

I click to subscribe in iTunes and when I do that it just gives me a list of all those shows for example iPad Today I click on subscribe it gives me a list I say Itunes and it just gives me a list of all there shows.
Never see it. Just says website
Are you looking on iTunes or on www.Twit.tv?
Other than that I would have to show you by remote support sometime

On twit.tv find the show want to subscribe to. On the left side from the pulldown menu select iTunes.  iTunes should automatically open.  In iTunes search for the podcast you want. Click on it. It may say subscribe if not click on the icon and iTunes should the page for that podcast.  When it does in the left side you will a gray bar labelled subscribe.
